attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
BAN SRILANKA


Srilanka has rejected  Mr Des Browne mission , call for ceasefire by Foregin minister David Milaband, UN, US, France, Germany , India, and many other  democratic forces in the world.
…..therefore it is TIME for UK andother countries  to show its power and muscle

Therefore We hereby request international community AND BRITISH PRIMINISTER  to consider FOLLOWING OPTIONS.

1) Close Srilankan missions.
2) Bring economic sanctions.
3) Ban on import and export to and from Srilanka to UK.


Srilanka is adamantly rejecting call for cease fire by international leaders , countries including that of Britain.
Srilanka is operating under the policy of we don’t care about WORLD OPINION.

International community has ONLY ONE OPTION now. 

Act within their authority. 
Therefore We hereby request international community AND BRITISH PRIMINISTER  to consider FOLLOWING OPTIONS.

4) Close Srilankan missions.
5) Bring economic sanctions.
6) Ban on import and export to and from Srilanka to UK.
